channel.title: Help please!
channel.description: Umm...I was just kinda making godwars on my server, and I have all of the right npcs and there in the correct position...I just need to know how to make them drop godswords and other things. So if you could explain to me how to make them drop what I want please tell me ... and I tryed NpcDrops.cfg, I even added in there...idk...Just HELP ME PLEASE!!!!

item.title: Help please!
item.dc:creator: @Dark_Soul2 -Dark Soul-
item.description:
@Dark_Soul2 wrote:

Umm…I was just kinda making godwars on my server, and I have all of the right npcs and there in the correct position…I just need to know how to make them drop godswords and other things. So if you could explain to me how to make them drop what I want please tell me … and I tryed NpcDrops.cfg, I even added in there…idk…Just HELP ME PLEASE!!!
